column4: Hi I just got this new dual core amd64 laptop, runnig 686 version of ubuntu edgy, i was wondering can i just switch to the smp kernel and it actually use both processors or do i need the 64 bit os for that?
Using an smp kernel is sufficient.
thanks for youjr reply i will try that
Although I think as of Edgy there is no separate kernel for SMP and the default kernel supports it.
